title: Marjorie Cameron
summary: Marjorie Cameron Parsons Kimmel (April 23, 1922 â€“ July 24, 1995), who professionally used the mononym Cameron, was an American artist, poet, actress and occultist. A follower of Thelema, the new religious movement established by the English occultist Aleister Crowley, she was married to rocket pioneer and fellow Thelemite Jack Parsons.
